welcome to my academic web site

More Deep Learning for Ultrasound Imaging

21 Sep 2021

We continued our work on using deep learning for ultrasound imaging and Georgios Pilikos just presented our current results (virtually) at the 2021 IEEE Symposium (IUS) Ultrasonics. Check out the conference papers on an Deep Learning for Multi-View Ultrasonic Image Fusion (open access link) and an Single Plane-Wave Imaging using Physics-Based Deep Learning (open access link). Thanks to everyone involved, in particular to Georgios.
